column4: How can I understand whether php is installed on my ubuntu  or not ?
maybe try running a test script, or look in /etc/apache2/mods_enabled
: Not running
: How to install php on Ubuntu ?
use the synaptic package manager to install the php5 package
it's located under System->Administration
: I am on a server i.e. shell
ah
then use sudo apt-get install php5
you will also need to run sudo apt-get install libapache2-mod-php5 and sudo /etc/init.d/apache2 restart
: I saw them getting automatically installed !!
actually, you might not need to run those last two
just do the first one and try it
yes, apt-get is a magical tool ;)
: Done , but still not running http://web2dziner.com/form.php
what does it say?
never mind, I can check the page myself
: It asks me to download it !!!
did installing php5 restart apache2?
: oo, sorry . Now it runs
great!
